description: In a bright art studio with large windows, a female art teacher in a blue outfit gives guidance to a young Black male student who is painting an abstract piece on an easel. The teacher leans in, points at the canvas, and talks to the student. She then moves to check on another student before returning her focus to the young man, who continues to work on his painting.

events.action: An art teacher stands behind a young male student, leaning in to give him advice on his painting.
The teacher steps back from the student and walks over to another student, as the young man continues to paint.
